segment.source: Restore the Archive from a Backup
segment.target: Restore the Archive from a Backup

segment.source: Restore the Archive from a Backup
segment.target: Restore the Archive from a Backup

segment.source: Restore the Archive from a Backup
segment.target: Restore the Archive from a Backup

segment.source: If a disaster occurs and the archive for Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is damaged or destroyed, an AGPM Administrator (Full Control) can restore the archive from a backup copy prepared in advance and then import from the production environment any Group Policy Objects (GPOs) that are not in the archive or for which the version in production is more current than that in the archive.
segment.target: If a disaster occurs and the archive for Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is damaged or destroyed, an AGPM Administrator (Full Control) can restore the archive from a backup copy prepared in advance and then import from the production environment any Group Policy Objects (GPOs) that are not in the archive or for which the version in production is more current than that in the archive.

segment.source: For information about how to restore an archive backup to a different server, see Move the AGPM Server and the Archive.
segment.target: For information about how to restore an archive backup to a different server, see Move the AGPM Server and the Archive.

segment.source: A user account that has access to the AGPM Server (the computer on which the AGPM Service is installed) and to the folder that contains the archive is required to complete this procedure.
segment.target: A user account that has access to the AGPM Server (the computer on which the AGPM Service is installed) and to the folder that contains the archive is required to complete this procedure.

segment.source: To restore the archive from a backup
segment.target: To restore the archive from a backup

segment.source: Stop the AGPM Service.
segment.target: Stop the AGPM Service.

segment.source: For more information, see Start and Stop the AGPM Service.
segment.target: For more information, see Start and Stop the AGPM Service.

segment.source: Remove the existing archive.
segment.target: Remove the existing archive.

segment.source: By default, the archive folder is %ProgramData%MicrosoftAGPM, however the AGPM Administrator who installed Microsoft Advanced Group Policy Management - Server may have entered a different location during setup.
segment.target: By default, the archive folder is %ProgramData%MicrosoftAGPM, however the AGPM Administrator who installed Microsoft Advanced Group Policy Management - Server may have entered a different location during setup.

segment.source: Re-create the archive folder by configuring the archive path, AGPM Service Account, Archive Owner, and listening port.
segment.target: Re-create the archive folder by configuring the archive path, AGPM Service Account, Archive Owner, and listening port.

segment.source: Using the same values as used during the original installation is not necessary.
segment.target: Using the same values as used during the original installation is not necessary.

segment.source: For more information, see Modify the AGPM Service.
segment.target: For more information, see Modify the AGPM Service.

segment.source: Copy the contents of the archive backup to the archive folder, copying the subfolders and files to make sure that each subfolder and file inherits the permissions of the archive folder.
segment.target: Copy the contents of the archive backup to the archive folder, copying the subfolders and files to make sure that each subfolder and file inherits the permissions of the archive folder.

segment.source: Be careful not to overwrite the archive folder.
segment.target: Be careful not to overwrite the archive folder.

segment.source: If you not sure about whether a GPO in the archive backup is more current than the copy of that GPO in production, generate a difference report and compare their settings.
segment.target: If you not sure about whether a GPO in the archive backup is more current than the copy of that GPO in production, generate a difference report and compare their settings.

segment.source: For more information, see Identify Differences Between GPOs, GPO Versions, or Templates.
segment.target: For more information, see Identify Differences Between GPOs, GPO Versions, or Templates.

segment.source: Restart the AGPM Service.
segment.target: Restart the AGPM Service.

segment.source: For more information, see Start and Stop the AGPM Service.
segment.target: For more information, see Start and Stop the AGPM Service.

segment.source: Additional references
segment.target: Additional references

segment.target: Back Up the Archive

segment.target: Move the AGPM Server and the Archive
